name: Frank N' Mummy
description:
Frank N' Mummy is a frenetic action / battle game for 2 players. Choose your favorite character, Frank or Mummy, to repair your own body parts before your opponent!

Game developed for Global Game Jam 2020.
Theme: REPAIR

Dev. Team:

Lucas Naspolini (Programming)
Marina Bittencourt (UI Design)
Vanessa Christoff (Art)
